25856.現在 <%sL_CATEGORY_NAME>鍛冶職人レベル<%dL_SYOKUN:

What do you want to craft?<break>

30018.<speed=0>これ以上は 冷やせない！: <speed=0>The temperature can't be lowered any further!

30133.鍛冶とは 素材となる地金をたたいて\n目的のアイテムを 作ることです。\n<br:
Blacksmithing is the art of forging items by striking the metal used to make them. As you strike the metal, your forge level will
increase... Aim for the green success zone on the gauge... The quality of the finished product is determined by the accuracy... To
execute the forge command, you need to concentrate. If you lose concentration, you won't be able to execute them, so pace
yourself and choose your commands... The metal has a temperature, and when the temperature drops, it's hard to increase the
forge... If the metal gets too cold, the session is over... Please note that if the game is interrupted due to a communication
error while blacksmithing, all materials will be lost...

31397.ばくれつ打ちを使うと\n一気に ６回 たたくことができますが\nどこに当たるかは:
With the Bakuretsu-uchi, you can hit him six
times in one go, but you never know where
you'll hit him!

31398.冷やし込みを使うと\n地金の温度を ３００度下げることができます。\nすごく弱く:
By using C-C-Cold Blow, you can lower the
temperature by 300 degrees. P-p-perfect for
very p-p-precise strikes!

31399.てかげん打ちを使うと\n半分のチカラで たたくことができます。\n細かい調整をし:
By using Lightening Bash, you can strike with
half power. Useful if you only need to make
very slight adjustments.

31400.会心0.1％アップは\n覚えているだけで 常に会心率が\n0.1％分 上がるよう:
Your chance of scoring a critical hit has
increased by 0.1% permanently!

31401.会心0.2％アップは\n覚えているだけで 常に会心率が\n0.2％分 上がるよう:
Your chance of scoring a critical hit has
increased by 0.2% permanently!

31402.会心0.3％アップは\n覚えているだけで 常に会心率が\n0.3％分 上がるよう:
Your chance of scoring a critical hit has
increased by 0.3% permanently!

31403.会心0.3％アップは\n覚えているだけで 常に会心率が\n0.3％分 上がるよう:
Your chance of scoring a critical hit has
increased by 0.3% permanently!

31404.会心0.5％アップは\n覚えているだけで 常に会心率が\n0.5％分 上がるよう:
Your chance of scoring a critical hit has
increased by 0.5% permanently!

31405.みだれ打ちを使うと\n一気に ４回 たたくことができますが\nどこに当たるかは:
By using Multibash, you can hit four times in
succession, but the hits are random!

31406.ねらい打ちを使うと\nとぎすました 会心率の高い一発を放ちます。:
By using Crackshot Bash, you can strike with
a high critical hit chance.

31407.上下打ちを使うと\n上下の２マス分を同時に\nやや強めのチカラで 鍛えられます。:
By using Double Bash, you can make a strong
vertical strike over two squares.

31408.３倍打ちを使うと\nひとつのマスを ３倍のチカラで\n大きく鍛えられます。:
By using Triple Whammy, you can strike a
single square with three times the power.

31410.火力上げを使うと\n地金の温度を ３００度上げることができます。\nカタくて鍛え:
By using Sizzly Puff, you can raise the
temperature 300 degrees. Useful when forging
more difficult items.

31411.４連打ちは\nやや強めのチカラで ２×２の４マス分を\n広く鍛える 豪快な技です:
Quadrabash is a powerful skill that hits
in a 2x2 area with stronger power!

37939.鍛冶の遊び方の説明です！\n<br>\n熱くなった地金をたたくと 鍛え度メーター:
Here's how to play blacksmithing! As you strike the hot metal, the forge meter will rise... Adjust your forge meter so that it is
within the green success zone... When all your gauges are within the green success zone, you can use the "Finish" command. The
lower the temperature of the metal, the harder it will be to raise the forge... Keep an eye on the temperature of the metal and
your concentration as you work towards completion!

37942.２倍打ちを使うと\nひとつのマスを ２倍のチカラで\n大きく鍛えられます。:
By using Double Whammy, you can strike a
single square with two times the power.

39003.超４連打ちは\n２倍のチカラで ２×２の４マス分を\n広く鍛える とても豪快な技:
Kaquadrabash is a powerful skill that hits
in a 2x2 area with double the strength!

44084.一度 コツをつかんだレシピは\n『いっぱつしあげ』が できるようになります。\n:
Once you have a knack for a recipe, the "Quick Craft" command becomes available.
Quick Craft allows you to finish the item in no time flat! However, items created this way can never be ★★★ quality.
In addition, the chance of getting a critical hit while using "Craft Normally" has increased slightly!
